name: shelter (itch) (bitbrain)
description:
The year is 2049. After the big war only few people survived the catastrophe. Rumor has it that there are a few bunkers still active. The so called shelters are the perfect hiding spot to escape the situation.

After losing his team, Corporal Johnson is eager to find such a shelter before it is too late.

Be warned, most shelters have been stormed by the horde!

Built within 48 hours during #minibeansjam5

code, music, pixelart by bitbrain

Toolkit

  • 🗺 Tiled
  • 🔊 Ableton Intro
